item.description:
Group member Tom has volunteered to organize a ride for this Saturday!

It will start at the first parking of the East Bay Bike Path in East Providence. The one that has a nice overlook and is right on Veterans Memorial Parkway.

We'll meet at 1:00 PM and the 33 mile ride will go through Seekonk, Swansea, Warren, Barrington, and Bristol. Part goes along the bike path. We'll ride at a easy pace (i.e., about 12 mph). Tom plans to stop for ice cream. People who come should bring a snack." He'll be in a grey Kia with a chrome roof rack. I usually park on the grass, under a tree.

Note: Adam will NOT be leading this ride. If you have questions, concerns or comments, please contact Tom. His cell is 401-369-5615.
item.how_to_find_us: Tom's cell is 401-369-5615. He has a grey Kia with a chrome roof rack.
item.name: Biking 33 miles with Tom (12mph, 33 miles total)
